title: (Expression of Interest) Looking for friendly people to join a community
body:
Opening up my steam group and teamspeak 3 server for all friendly people who wish to play normal's for fun and maybe even create some ranked teams.

Also planning on starting regular ARAM games for fun or RP prizes.

This thread is just expression of interest so if you think this would be the sort of thing you would like to join leave a post. If this picks up then i would be looking for mods/admins so leave a comment if you would be interested in that.

Steam group has around 150 members for CS:GO and other games: 
> http://steamcommunity.com//groups/ilIuminati

And the teamspeak for anyone to use: 
> 27.50.70.178:10068

(tired as f*ck thats why this post is so boring to read**)

replies.body: Same here, i would love to join! :) I'm not a great player either, but i do love the game! I'm lvl 27, and i love to play ADC. :)
do you mind if i add you to my friends list?
I'd be interested :D I'm not like an amazing player at LOL but i do love the game. I'm only a lvl14 and a little scared to play norm games but with the right gaming friends i should be fine :D
